episode.title: Hatzlachh Supply Company, Inc. v. United States

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: In 78-1175, Hatzlachh Supply against the United States for reasons stated again in a per curiam opinion filed with the clerk today.
The judgment of the United States Court of Claims is vacated and the case has remanded to that Court for further proceedings consistent with the opinion of the Court filed today.
Mr. Justice Blackmun filed a dissenting opinion in this case.
